185631431.review: 我也也许应该叫他集中营或者停尸房模拟器，首先先建一个大大的停尸房和一个军械库然后划一块地。把它设置为囚犯接受处然后四周加上电网然后在附近部署武警和狙击手再在附近建设几个狙击塔，并授权他们自由开火权限，我们甚至不用建造宿舍，餐厅之类的只要有我们可靠的武警以及万能的快反防爆队没有什么时是我们解决不了的。然后我们就可以快乐的接收犯人了，不过没想到每个犯人居然还有住宿费和餐食补助。真的是太好了。嗯？什什么？那些犯人居然因为日常需求不满。暴动了。那些凡人居然因为日常需求不满暴动了？没关系，只要我们授权自由开火就行了剩下的交给我们的可靠的武警和快反防爆队，他们会处理好的，至于囚犯？先放停尸房先腾一下地方，明天早上上灵车拉走就好了。然后我们就可以迎接下一批囚犯了，对了在这里囚犯人人平等，所以他们的待遇和上一批不会有什么很大的区别。

185393250.review:
Prison Architect is an absolute blast! I went in thinking I'd just build a few walls and maybe make a prison, but it quickly turned into an all-consuming task of managing inmates, keeping the peace, and making sure my prison doesn't turn into a cellular disaster. There’s a lot of strategy involved, from designing the cells to managing staff—this game will have you feeling like a true warden (with a bit of power-hungry flair).

If you're into building and management games with a bit of chaos on the side, Prison Architect is the cell you'll want to be in!

185293190.review:
Hola.
Es entretenido a tope.
Solo he estado 57 minutos pero puedo decir que la montaña rusa de emociones que he sentido ha valido cada euro que he pagado. Han sido momentos de frustración por no poder iniciarlo, cabreo por que parece bueno, impotencia por la pasta que me he dejado y no poder recuperar,  y todo por estar ante un juego que no he conseguido que me funcione de ninguna de las maneras. Menos mal que Steam no cuenta el tiempo pasado buscando soluciones en internet y probándolas sino sería para echarse a temblar por el tiempo perdido.
Nota: La mejor solución que he encontrado: Reinstala el sistema operativo con una instalación limpia. Instala Steam y a continuación únicamente Prision Architect. Si sigue sin funcionar es que en tu ordenador no funciona. 
Por supuesto no he seguido el consejo. Sobra decir que mi ordenador cumple todos los requisitos del juego.
Saludos

While I LOVE this game and have been playing it for ages, I simply cannot recommend buying it. You can choose to play the 2015 and 2018 versions, but if you choose the current one, it will leave you with bugs and disappointment. The base game costs €25, and the DLCs cost €60.

The game forces you to install a pointless launcher that shows ads for DLCs, and ingame it constantly displays images of the DLCs that you should buy´, theres even a bug where you get "tips" about an item which is in one DLC, and this tip pops up constantly.

I cannot recommend the current game. If you buy this game and then play the 2015/2018 version, it's playable and a lot of fun. However, because of greed, the most up-to-date version is a complete mess, which I do NOT recommend you buy.

184808299.review:
Very fun game to play single player and with friends, would recommend any prison architects to play it though, however during game play noticed the game takes a lot of memory, and can start to get laggy around 300-500 prisoners (for me.)

Pro's:
Prison building system is easy to use and get a grasp of.
Fun to build and manage the prison including, making a regime, prisoner programs, and DLC stuff.
Fun to play with friends and watch a riot start.


Con's:
Like previously mentioned, takes a lot of memory from your PC.
Can get laggy after reaching 300-500 prisoners.
Also crashes somewhat frequently without any reason.
Sometimes the multiplayer would not work (endlessly try to load servers but would never load.)

Overall the game is a pretty fun experience minus the crashing and lag, its a concept that is basic enough to understand especially with the starting game story mode, and at other times can be pretty complex, but it is easy to get a grasp for the game.

Experience wise I would recommend for other players looking for a good prison builder game.

I recommend the base game, I do NOT recommend any of the dlc.

184542129.review:
Prison Architect to prawdziwa perełka wśród gier strategicznych, która potrafi wciągnąć na długie godziny – w moim przypadku ponad 130! Gra oferuje nie tylko świetnie zaprojektowaną mechanikę zarządzania więzieniem, ale także ogromną swobodę w tworzeniu i dostosowywaniu obiektów.  

Jednym z największych atutów Prison Architect jest rozbudowany system symulacji – od zarządzania personelem, przez zaspokajanie potrzeb więźniów, aż po reagowanie na niespodziewane sytuacje, takie jak zamieszki czy próby ucieczki. Każda decyzja ma znaczenie, co sprawia, że gra jest jednocześnie wyzwaniem i satysfakcjonującą zabawą.  

Graficzny styl, choć prosty, jest niezwykle przejrzysty i ma swój urok. Twórcy zadbali także o humorystyczne akcenty, które świetnie rozładowują napięcie w trudniejszych momentach.  

Zawartość dodatkowa, w tym modyfikacje tworzone przez społeczność, daje praktycznie nieograniczone możliwości rozgrywki. Jeśli ktoś szuka gry, w którą można włożyć dziesiątki, jeśli nie setki godzin, Prison Architect jest idealnym wyborem.  

Polecam zarówno fanom gier strategicznych, jak i osobom, które lubią kreatywne podejście do zarządzania!

184320710.review:
[32 prisoners have serious complaints]

>*distant shotgun blast*
>31 prisoners have serious complaints
Prison Architect is one of those games, kind of like the sims, with which you occasionally have the brief moments of clarity where you realise that you're wasting your time scheduling and organising the lives of simulated people and you get the sudden urge to do something productive in real life like build some furniture or take a cooking class or raise a family.

Thankfully these moments pass and you can go back to playing the game. >10/10

울타리를 치고 감방을 만들고 간수를 배치하고 밥주고 운동장 만들어주고 이거 해주고 저거 해주고 하는 게임임.
솔직히 범죄자들한테 왜 이렇게까지 해줘야하는지 잘 모르겠어서 일부러 폭동 일으킬때까지 뒀다가 몰살해버림.

184255591.review: I first played this game years ago when it was free on a game pass. I absolutely loved it. I must have spent hundreds of hours on base game alone. After hearing it mentioned in conversation years after I'd played it last, I bought it on Steam with the DLC. While the base game is fantastic, with the campaign being short but well done and thought provoking, I LOVE the DLC, especially the eco pack. I'm still finding things out about the new content but it genuinely adds to the gameplay in a way that is interesting and challenging. I've already spent nearly 40 hours playing in the space of 4 days.

What was a great, compact little management sim has, for better or worse, been given the Paradox Interactive treatment. This means an abundance of DLC, some of which are legitimately game-changing, interesting, and a great value addition to the game, while many are just cosmetic skins for your single-player management sim.

Still excellent, just check the DLC page before buying to understand what the true cost of the game might be.

184045018.review:
Play Time: 40.4 hours (Probably closer to 35hours)
Achievements: 14 of 18
Date/Version: 12/28/2024 . UnknownVerision
Rating: 6.3



Prison Architect is what I would think Rim World is but a cheaper version, with less complexity but hey who knows I'm too cheap to buy RIMWORLD to truly say.
Prison Architect is a sandbox, base/prison building game, where you do your best to create an awesome prison. Or heck in my case an awesome plant to make money off of growing tress. 
There's everything from gangs, riots, escapees, death-row inmates, perverts, scandals, drugs, violence, oppression, reforming programs, Free Education, Free medical coverage, all the things you can think of related You know all the good things that make you want to go to prison. 
There are a few different game modes, and DLC'S, which include escaping from the prison playing as an inmate.  Campaign mode, which helps you understanding how to play the game.... granted on Campaign 5 one of the achievements doesn't work properly for newer players. Sandbox mode where you can start from scratch, and a nice workshop, where you can upload and download prisons. Overall I found my self constantly trying to find out how to get things to work, but the game did suck me in and had me loosing track of time. Please note this is probably my first game if this style thus those experienced with Base sim buildings will probably find it easier than me. A must get for those who want a nice cheap base/city building simulator that provides thousands of options and probably hundreds of hours of game play value. 

PROS:
Definitely felt like I was building and running a prison.

NEUTRAL:
Limitations: Everything requires some “engine” to build another part to function the way it's supposed to even if it may or may not make sense. 
Controls/UI


CONS:
2 achievements that seem not to work unless you manipulate the games data.
Bugs (errors).

183988645.review:
<监狱建筑师>
游戏有云存档，但仅限于存档！
剧情模式的解锁进度不在云存档范围内。Emmm···
剧情还不错，一环扣一环。

吐槽一下~
[h1]这什么启动器呀，它肿么一直在更新呐···
还停不了了都···[/h1]

游戏有很多收藏要素，比如那个宝丽来照片和笔记等等。
反正俺就看一把剧情。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3384254484
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3384080624
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3384966985
剧情流水账：
[spoiler] 
1、死刑犯
首席执行官接到合同要执行死刑。首先要建一间行刑室。
地基，大门，墙壁，标记房间用途，放置物品。
犯人爱德华·罗姆塞曾是牧师，在自家撞见妻子和他人通奸于是2枪解决了他们。
在其他地方可能只要终身监禁，这里要电刑。
玩家不负责评判，只负责执行。
行刑室的电椅是高功率电器要专门连接电网，并加装高电容防止使用时跳匝，最后行刑。

2、巴勒莫
开场监狱厨房火灾，联系消防队，控制消防队员灭火。
救下废墟中的唐·巴勒莫，他曾是黑帮老大。
雇佣工人和医师进行清理残骸设置垃圾区以及救治伤者。
唐·巴勒莫的孩子桑尼·巴勒莫和尼科·塔莫莱蒂来看望他，他怀疑是两孩子之一做得，但他们说这只是意外，唐·巴勒莫不行了，但外面还有家业要继承。
要加派警卫进行巡逻防止暴动。
餐厅和厨房没了需要重建。
此时执行官发现送入监狱的货物中带有私货，大概率是巴勒莫家族向监狱私运的，可没证据。
唐·维达利亚·巴勒莫是东海黑帮家族之一的头目，长子安东尼·巴勒姆掌管日常，尼科·塔莫莱蒂娶了巴勒莫家族唯一女儿维达利亚时加入了家族企业。桑尼·巴勒莫脾气如公牛不太聪明的样子。他们的家族经营毒P贸易直到安东尼偷奸被爱德华·罗姆塞射杀，警方从现场找到了DP，于是一夜间巴勒莫家族彻底坍塌全员除了女儿维达利亚（不参与家族业务）外全部牢底坐穿。
现在监狱面临DP问题，但现在暂时不好处理，优先处理厨房和餐厅正常运转并安装自动喷水灭火系统防止再次火灾。
通过需求统计确认囚犯痛点并加以改进。
完成一切后浴室出现一尸体！好在有监控！
通过监控得知大火是尼科·塔莫莱蒂针对桑尼·巴勒莫放的，可惜目标没事反而殃及唐·巴勒莫。
桑尼打算刺杀尼科却反被尼科手下佛朗基勒住脖子···
挣扎中桑尼解决了佛朗基后身亡，尼科在打斗中重伤。
此时巴勒莫家族的人不多了，可以搜查监狱清除DP了。
接着开始帮助戒D和戒酒相关建设。
完成一切让监狱恢复正轨后···在医务室观看巴勒莫家族的后续。
维达利亚·巴勒莫来监狱看望唐和尼科···
唐撑不过这周，虽然尼科搞砸了，但他还想和维达利亚一起脱离苦海远走高飞···
但维达利亚做不到，她是巴勒莫家族的人，她父亲去世后尼科这个局外人取代他的位置会让敌人轻易击败家族，为此她来和尼科离婚并告别···并最后看一眼父亲···

3、G.A.B.O.S
新闻正播这监狱发生暴动，工作人员都撤回外网等待军事援助。监狱执行官查尔斯·华莱士下落不明，无期徒刑的道格拉斯·本尼迪克被认为是暴力事件的罪魁祸首。还有上个月被刺杀的黑帮老大唐·巴勒莫。市长卡尔文·海勒发表讲话。
查尔斯·华莱士的副手开始负责恢复秩序。
开场就是谈判人员在监狱外围呼叫了防爆警察和医务人员准备安排人员进入监狱恢复秩序。
本尼迪克特此时联系说首席执行官在他那，对方要车不然干掉人质。市长卡尔文·海勒不同意，并考虑占领闭路电视监控台。
从监控中发现本尼迪克特以左轮转盘的玩法逼问查尔斯·华莱士之前烧的文件内容。
最终查尔斯·华莱士说出实情，钱，本尼迪克特被关在监狱越久他能获得的钱越多，那些文件是能毁掉市长职业生涯的的证据，可惜现在他们全都逃不了了···
卡尔文·海勒市长确认后条子们破墙而入，将查尔斯·华莱士（弹孔在身上而不是头上，所以应该是条子打的···）和本尼迪克特在内的人全部制服，开始全面恢复控制。
建立医务室和停尸房救治伤员处理Shi体。
通过行政实施新的安防规则。

4、定罪
自从之前暴动后，监狱面临着各种政治审查，在找到新的首席执行官之前玩家主持大局。
博士沃尔特·赫斯特指出囚犯失去人性了，面临自杀问题，需要帮他们戒毒并引领其向上。同时他亲自看望了囚犯亨利·摩根。
建设新监狱建筑来容纳更多的囚犯。
再次看望亨利·摩根时他说出了他的过往，过去是本尼迪克特照顾了他并带他抢了运钞车，但被条子抓住了。
亨利害怕得不敢开枪，本尼迪克特干掉一个条子后负伤双双被捕。
建设牢房和工坊等设施容纳更多囚犯以及让囚犯工作。
沃尔特·赫斯特成功申请了摩根的家庭探视权，凯里·摩根带着婴儿来看望她的丈夫亨利·摩根。可惜对方因为藏着白酒导致失去了探视权···无耐她只好留下一张照片···
对此博士很失望，希望增设探视设施并加设课堂聘请教师教授基础知识并设置教堂进行精神教育。
警官基恩汇报自杀事件频发，有人吃了老鼠药狗带了···
此时沃尔特·赫斯特还以为是亨利想不开于是急忙去他的牢房看看，结果对方居然改过自新了！
之后等支线任务完成即可。

5、自力更生
新闻汇报监狱的最新进展，之前的暴乱事件已过去2年，那家监狱已经开始拆除重建。
卡尔文·海勒市长认为过去的惩罚式机制已过时了，于是决定用全新的监狱来取代它，新闻转到心理和康复专家沃尔特·赫斯特博士。
而主角则被市长任命为首席执行官进行全新的监狱建设。
首先阅读过去首席执行官的信件，接受辅助金开始建设监狱。
建设基础设施，按照补助要求建设监狱并获得补助。
补助的任务要求不断增长，最终玩家能建立一个很流弊的超大型监狱。

当进度到一定阶段后（任务不用全部做完）市长来电确认你是否要继续发展or结束。
这个宝丽来要找，我在中间的某个牢房附近找到的···

结局：
在博士沃尔特·赫斯特的帮助下亨利获得了假释，回到家和妻女拥抱在一起。最后在新闻播报中博士和市长介绍监狱将变得人性化为犯人回到社会而改变。
 [/spoiler]

183696776.review:
Game was very good.

-Now everything is locked behind DLCs
-Paradox launchers is forced without a reason

GG Paradox.

183672518.review:
Its buggy and uncared for
By paradox doctrine the game is heavily locked behind DLCs
It would seem the game isn't well optimised as even managing a small prison can drop fps and in-game time significantly
There's no real options for graphics, just choosing resolution and the AA setting
Given you have the DLCs the game offers some good replayability and gameplay.
Mods and mutators help make the game changing each prison you make
Escape mode also exists taking on the role of playing as a prisoner rather than the warden/architect

Overall its a decent classic game, just monopolised and forgotten
Look into Prison architect 2 instead, though I doubt the DLC trend will be dropped

183636690.review: spent 20 mins on the forced tutorial just to watch a man who should have been given a medal put in the chair, did the boring tutorial teach about foundations somewhere? dunno wasn't interested in the story after that an the whole hey did you know electric chair's need power? woah no way I though i was Zeus incarnate , but i just spent a few hours just to find out you don't actually get to build your prison you just get to tell your guys to be like hey go build me a square with hallways an spaces for the pref designed rooms, , what you spent a few hour hours designing a prison haha get f'ed it's not in doors unless you use our pre made foundations. gee maybe that should have been the tutorial in a game called prison architect then again it's pre designed slop what a waste of time im almost glad paradox allegedly stole the IP even though they will 100 percent make PA2 worse somehow probably since it's more like prison prefabrication anyway

183570617.review: 하다보면 안 되는 게 끝도 없이 생기는데 왜 안되는지도 모르겠고 제 22시간은 튜토리얼 해보기, 교도소를 유튜브보고 혹은 마음대로 지어보기가 전부였을 뿐 교도소는 하루도 제대로 운영된 적이 없습니다. 하나하나 다 찾아보면서 해야 할 수 있을 것 같네요. 덜 위험한 죄수만 받고 평화주의자 교도소장을 고용해도 폭동은 어차피 일어납니다.

183560797.review: Super cool game ,don't need to buy all the dlcs to enjoy the game

183555476.review: Prison Architect est bien plus qu'un simple jeu de gestion. C'est une exploration complexe et nuancée du système pénitentiaire et de la nature humaine. À travers ses mécanismes de gameplay, son esthétique unique et son approche narrative réfléchie, le jeu parvient à divertir tout en suscitant des réflexions profondes sur des questions sociales essentielles. Que vous soyez un amateur de jeux de gestion ou simplement curieux d'explorer un monde complexe, Prison Architect offre une expérience captivante qui mérite d'être vécue. En fin de compte, ce jeu est un exemple parfait de la manière dont le divertissement peut être utilisé pour explorer des thèmes sérieux et engager les joueurs sur des questions qui touchent notre société.

183528216.review: Bueno, entretenido, divertido, pero como que falta que expliquen explicar algunas mecanicas
